overview.process: 4 rounds: Phone Screen → Technical → System Design → Behavioral

rounds.title: Phone Screen Round
rounds.description: Initial technical screening with a Google engineer

questions.title: Two Sum - Array Problem
questions.story: Meet Alex, a software engineer interviewing at Google. In this phone screen, Alex faces the classic Two Sum problem and demonstrates optimal hash map solution.

questions.title: Valid Parentheses
questions.story: During Sarah's Google phone screen, she encounters the Valid Parentheses problem and uses stack data structure to solve it efficiently.

rounds.title: Technical Interview
rounds.description: Deep dive into algorithms and data structures

questions.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
questions.story: In the Google office, Maria faces a tree problem...
